attributes.action: ban ministers from utilising private health care or sending their children to private schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of the government would take the problems facing the NHS and education more seriously if they were having a more direct effect on their own lives. As many of them opt for private alternatives, they are not affected to the same degree as those who cannot afford the same luxury. 
If ministers were banned from using private schools or health care it would provide the perfect incentive for them to apply the necessary attention, effort, urgency and funding to these important areas so that they are run to a standard that members of the government would be prepared to accept for themselves and their families.
